definition: to leave in place/to set aside (for further use)/to retain/to detain/(medicine) indwelling
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Objective To discuss close venous indwelling needle used in the treatment of respiratory diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨密闭式静脉留置针在呼吸内科患者的应用。

sentences.english: But, leaving buy interrogate and arrest to be passed on property is different.
sentences.chinese: 但是，留置盘问与拘传在性质上是不同的。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss application of pulse type tube in vein infusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脉冲式封管在静脉留置针输液中的应用。

sentences.english: The prisoners were left to rot in prison.
sentences.chinese: 那些囚犯被留置在牢中任其消瘦。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Y integrated catheter in patients with pregnancy hypertension syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察Y型静脉留置针在妊高症患者中的应用效果。

sentences.english: The IV also allows for easier administration of Pitocin should labor need to be augmented.
sentences.chinese: 留置针还使得在临盆中需要增加催产素时便于管理。

sentences.english: You’ll definitely get an IV if an epidural is on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 假如你选择了硬膜外麻醉的话，绝对会用到留置针。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effective remain length of nose and gastric tuber during small volume gastric lavage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小儿小容量洗胃时鼻胃管留置的有效长度。

sentences.english: But there is no agreement about the nature of possessory lien on vessel.
sentences.chinese: 而船舶留置权的性质在不同国家之间也没有得到统一。

sentences.english: Cystitis and urethritis are complications of prolonged use of indwelling catheters.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱炎和尿道炎是长期应用留置导尿管的并发症。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the measures for improving the success rate of indwelling needle.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高静脉留置针穿刺困难者的一次穿刺成功率。

sentences.english: Venousindwelling needle hasbeen widely used clinically and improper application can result in phlebitis .
sentences.chinese: 静脉留置针已广泛用于临床，使用不当可引起静脉炎。

sentences.english: A lien against the property is granted to secure an obligation
sentences.chinese: 准予对财产拥有留置权以保证义务之履行。

sentences.english: This article discusses one clause in the Gencon C/P form which might appropriately be entitled "lien clause".
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论金康租约及其他主要租约中的留置权条款。

sentences.english: Send mail to poster when their posting is held for approval?
sentences.chinese: 当投书遭留置移送裁决时是否要通知寄信人？

sentences.english: To adopt suggestion way in her mind to induce micturition .
